name: Master of Card Battle
description:
Master of card battle is a digital collectible card game where you play in a turn-based  match between two opponents.

Each player has two spaces on the ground to play their entities, when one of them is destroyed, the player can replace another from his hand. Playing games, overcoming games and destroying your cards gives you 'tears', a resource used to improve your cards.

This project is under development, a new version will be published soon with improvements, new creatures and bug fixes
